abilities.name: Spectral Throw
about: Throws a spectral copy of encounter's melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to the encounter, in a spinning attack that damages enemies in its path

abilities.name: Sniper's Mark
about: Curses player, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them

abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Enduring Cry
about: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the encounter and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction

abilities.name: Immortal Call
about: Encounter takes less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time

abilities.name: Vaal Spectral Throw
about: Throws a spectral copy of encounter melee weapon. It spirals out in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Cyclone
about: Damages enemies around encounter, then performs a spinning series of attacks as it travels to a target location

abilities.name: Cleave
about: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them

abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Warlords Mark
about: Curses player. Attacking the cursed player will leech life and mana

abilities.name: Cyclone
about: Damages enemies around encounter, then performs a spinning series of attacks as it travels to a target location

abilities.name: Cold Snap
about: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. Also creates an expanding area which is filled with chilled ground, and deals cold damage over time to enemies

abilities.name: Vaal Cold Snap
about: Creates a sudden burst of cold around encounter, damaging enemies. This also creates a chilling area around encounter which expands and deals cold damage over time to surrounding enemies in addition to chilling them

abilities.name: Vaal Glacial Hammer
about: Hits enemies, converting some of encounter's physical damage to cold damage. It traps enemies with encounter in a circle of ice so that they can't escape

abilities.name: Firestorm
about: Rains numerous fiery bolts in an area

abilities.name: Righteous Fire
about: Engulfs encounter in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies

abilities.name: Fireball
about: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes

abilities.name: Arctic Armour
about: Conjures an icy barrier that chills enemies when encounter is hit. Encounter drop chilled ground while moving, and take less Fire and Physical damage while stationary

abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
about: Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning

abilities.name: Storm Call
about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast

abilities.name: Lightning Warp
about: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and encounter's movement speed. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the encounter was and where they teleported to

abilities.name: Conductivity
about: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to lightning damage and gives damage hit more chance to shock
